memories.title: Muralla Shared State System v2.0
memories.content: Local-only shared source of truth for cross-IDE development. Uses filesystem watching for real-time sync. Commands: windsurf-sync context, todo add/list/complete, memory add/search, ai-log. All instances share TODOs, memories, and activity logs.

memories.title: Windsurf Development Rules
memories.content: Always use shared TODOs instead of individual tools. Log AI interactions with windsurf-sync ai-log. Create memories for important knowledge. Check context at session start. Use appropriate AI types: ai-generation, ai-refactor, ai-debug, ai-chat, ai-explanation, ai-optimization, ai-testing.

memories.title: Muralla Project Architecture
memories.content: Full-stack project management system. Backend: NestJS + Prisma + PostgreSQL on Render. Frontend: React + TypeScript on Render. Mobile: React Native + Capacitor. Shared state system in .shared-state/ directory for cross-IDE coordination.

memories.title: Windsurf Development Rule
memories.content: Always use shared state system for TODOs, AI logging, and knowledge capture. Mandatory session workflow: context → todo progress → ai-log → memory add → todo complete. Use correct AI types (ai-generation, ai-refactor, ai-debug, ai-chat, ai-explanation, ai-optimization, ai-testing) and comprehensive tagging (deployment, database, authentication, api, frontend, mobile, architecture, debugging, performance, testing). Cross-instance awareness required - other instances can see your work.
